actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research

official_title: To amend the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to ensure that States and local governments can quickly and safely remove flood debris so as to reduce the risk and severity of subsequent flooding.

summary.text: Amends the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to state that the Secretary of Agriculture and other executive branch officials may not prohibit or condition State or local flood debris removal efforts whose primary purpose is to reduce the risk and severity of subsequent flooding.

titles.title: To amend the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to ensure that States and local governments can quickly and safely remove flood debris so as to reduce the risk and severity of subsequent flooding.
